newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Gulf rigs up 1 at 167 in week.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Gulf rigs up 1 at 167 in week.

text.p: There were 166 rigs under contract in the U.S. Gulf as of April 4, unchanged from the period ending March 27, Offshore Data Services said Friday.
The utilization rate for rigs working in the Gulf, based on a total fleet of 180, was 92.8 percent.
The number of working rigs in the European/Mediterranean area remained unchanged at 103 rigs under contract out of a total fleet of 104, a utilization rate of 99.0 pct.
The worldwide rig count was up one at 572 out of a total fleet of 604, making the utilization rate 94.7 percent.
